description: Fever - elevation of body temperature
Diarrhea - frequent loose bowel movements
Cough - reflex action to clear airways
Dyspnea - difficulty in breathing
Heart disease - disorders of the heart
Anemia - deficiency of red blood cells
Jaundice - yellowing due to liver disorders
Dysuria - painful urination
Piles - swollen veins in anal region
Skin diseases - various dermatological conditions
Eye diseases - disorders affecting vision
Ear diseases - disorders affecting hearing
Head diseases - disorders of the head region
Sciatica - pain along sciatic nerve
Joint pain - pain in joints

Acidity - excessive acid production in stomach
Swelling - abnormal accumulation of fluid
Obesity - excessive accumulation of fat
Diabetes - excessive urination
Consumption - wasting disease
Tuberculosis - chronic lung disease
Erysipelas - spreading skin infection
Irregular fever - intermittent fever
Dual dosha fever - fever from two doshas
Triple dosha fever - fever from all doshas
Exogenous fever - fever from external causes
